deploy.startCommand: sh -c 'PK=/data/config/provider_keys.json; if [ -f $PK ]; then sed -i "s/:free//g" $PK; sed -i "s/ek-uRaemMkBnGyvzUcKh0PW5cwrHmSk9Lij4TJk4FEXEwByPoJI8O/$ELECTRONHUB_API_KEY/g" $PK; sed -i "s/ek-proxy-pNKaadyKCA5EdU6Nssko48pQxTdHyEQzzC8sMkRXPjoD/$ELECTRONHUB_API_KEY/g" $PK; fi && MOLTIS_DEPLOY_PLATFORM=railway exec moltis --bind 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT --no-tls --config-dir /data/config --data-dir /data'
